content: simple easily memorized & reversible just like a dishcloth should be all washed up yarn 1 skein peaches & crème cotton worsted yarn solid or ombre or similar yarn needles size 6 or 7 straights pattern x2 + border row 1 k4 *k* k4 row 2 k4 *p* k4 row 3 k4 *k1 p1* k4 row 4 k4 *k1 p1* k4 reversible stitch pattern reminded my dh of row 5 k4 *k* k4 an antique washboard sample shown used 1/2 skein of peaches & crème needle size 6 repeat row 1-5 for pattern used with 9 repeats between borders cast on 36 stitches or any even number to adjust the size of the cloth & knit 4 row in garter stitch begin pattern and knit until you are ready to add the last border end on a row 1 knit 4 row in garter stitch & bind off weave in ends enjoy abbreviations k=knit copyright 2010 by jill arnusch for jill knit it p=purl this pattern its photos and products made from this pattern are in- tended for private use only and may not be distributed for commercial purposes without the written consent of the designer
